alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Powell; Rockcastle; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 8:07PM EST until February 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky, south central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Estill, Menifee and Powell. In south central Kentucky, Rockcastle. In southeast Kentucky, Breathitt, Clay, Jackson, Lee, Magoffin, Morgan, Owsley and Wolfe. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 806 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... West Liberty, Irvine, Mount Vernon, Jackson, Beattyville, McKee, Campton, Booneville, Boone, Simpson, Henry, Lewis, Fincastle, Ravenna, Mount Olive, Proctor, White Ash, Belle Point, Corgleton and Maloney. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Estill; Jackson; Lee; Powell; Rockcastle; Wolfe
